channel.title: Music – BLUE ROOM
channel.description: Recent content in BLUE ROOM on Music

item.title: BLUE ROOM - simple
item.description:
If you took a look inside
Would you still stay a little bit longer
Eeny meeny miny moe, the tables turn and go
And it’s far but, I know I don’t know

Let’s keep it simple
We’re two different people
Looking for love in the dark
But my heart need a light it’s a see-through
You might be blind in the night, still I’m with you

네가 어디에 있든
따라가려 해도 너의 shadow는
더 이상 보이지 않아 it’s 어둠에 짙은
내 맘에 빛이 필요해 but it’s off in the distance

If you took a look inside
Would you still stay a little bit longer
Eeny meeny miny moe, the tables turn and go
And it’s far but, I know I don’t know

You got something I’m finding out
Show me the way how, losing my way now
